items.headline: Star Island mansion once owned by Rosie O’Donnell sells for $36 million after huge price drop
items.summary_en: Rosie O’Donnell’s former Miami home has sold for a staggering $36 million to the billionaire founder of Rockstar Energy Drink.

items.headline: N.Y. townhouse of late Ivana Trump gets another price cut: It’s now listed for $17.9 million
items.summary_en: The late Ivana Trump’s residence has taken yet another price decrease, with it now listed for $17.9 million—a staggering $8.6 million difference from its original listing price.

items.headline: Broadcom gives Wall Street plenty of reason to cheer, and its stock moves higher
items.summary_en: Not only did Broadcom’s outlook beat expectations, but the company announced a new large AI customer and CEO Hock Tan said he’s sticking around in that job until at least 2030.

items.headline: Lululemon says it has gotten ‘too predictable,’ as tariffs, outlook sink its stock
items.summary_en: Shares of Lululemon Athletica Inc. tumbled after hours on Thursday after the yoga-wear maker cut its full-year outlook, citing costs related to U.S. tariffs on imports.

items.headline: NFL fans can stream all games this season for the first time — and could end up paying less to do so
